definition: cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: Super soft micro-fleece fabric is soft on the face.
sentences.chinese: 特別柔軟的超細纖維絨布料貼在臉上很柔和。

sentences.english: Rifles should be regularly cleaned by pulling a piece of flannelette through.
sentences.chinese: 步槍應定期用一塊絨布擦乾淨。

sentences.english: If you give a child the choice between cold wire and comfy cloth, of course it’s going to choose the cloth.
sentences.chinese: 在冰冷的電線和溫暖的絨布中，小孩當然會選擇後者。

sentences.english: This quality does have sueded face and brushed back and soft handfeel which we like.
sentences.chinese: 這個品質絨布的正面爲仿皮，背面爲拉絨，手感柔軟。

sentences.english: Soft soft soft soft flannelette can come back eventually.
sentences.chinese: 軟軟柔柔的絨布終於可以回來了。

sentences.english: Rongbuk Glacier around this area is also the largest among all the glaciers here.
sentences.chinese: 而在絨布寺附近的冰川是珠峯最大的冰川羣。

sentences.english: When my grandmother owned it, it was tufted and covered in blue and gold striped chenille.
sentences.chinese: 當它還是我祖母的財產時，表面是藍金條紋的絨布。

sentences.english: When cleanness, it is OK to be wiped forcibly with clean dry flannelette or towel.
sentences.chinese: 清潔時，用乾淨的幹絨布或毛巾用力擦拭就可以了。

sentences.english: This means no flannel pajamas in bed.
sentences.chinese: 這意味着別在牀上穿絨布睡衣套裝。
上羅拉清潔器包的絨布不當。

sentences.english: Polyester soft nap fabric, fine-knitting uniform hand feeling in unique style.
sentences.chinese: 滌綸起絨布，布面細膩，毛感均勻，風格獨特。

sentences.english: For the dining and accommodation, Rongbuk Monastery is recommended.
sentences.chinese: 至於住宿和餐飲，絨布寺是不錯的選擇。

sentences.english: Selected high-density cover to prevent the leakage of small down.
sentences.chinese: 精選高密度防絨布，防止細小絨球外漏。

sentences.english: Wipe off any excess make-up with a clean, moist cotton flannel.
sentences.chinese: 用乾淨的溼絨布擦去多餘的化妝品。

sentences.english: At the foot of Mt. Everest is located the highest temple in the world, Rongbuk Monastery.
sentences.chinese: 在珠峯的山腳，有一座世界上最高的寺廟叫絨布寺。

sentences.english: Close the cover and use your lint free cloth to remove any obvious dirt or dust.
sentences.chinese: 把蓋關上，同時用你的棉絨布去除任何明顯的灰塵。

definition: ring pull (can)/strap handle (on bus or train)/circular door handle
